body_text:
Currently, when you click the badges in the sidebar to visit the page for a specific approval request, you're sent to a listing of all the approval requests logged for the recipe, and the page does not scroll to the request that you clicked on. This bit me when I was trying to see the status of an old approval request; I didn't realize that the page had multiple approval requests, and mistook the most recent one for the older one that I was looking for.
It'd be nice if it was more obvious which approval request is the specific one I was looking for from a sidebar link, maybe by highlighting it, scrolling to it, opening a page with only that approval request, or some other method.
